author: VNExplorer
title: Todde “Fonti rinnovabili sono centrali per lo sviluppo della Sardegna”
text: Todde “Fonti rinnovabili sono centrali per lo sviluppo della Sardegna” CAGLIARI (ITALPRESS) – “Dopo settimane di lavoro e di confronto, il DL ‘Misure urgenti per la salvaguardia del paesaggio e dei beni paesaggistici e ambientalì è legge. La Sardegna potrà decidere quale dovrà essere il suo destino energetico: non ci saranno più autorizzazioni che passeranno sopra la nostra testa. Qualsiasi autorizzazione verrà decisa e data dagli uffici della Regione, chiaramente interpellando i Comuni, i territori e i cittadini”. Così Alessandra Todde, presidente della Regione Sardegna, in un post su Facebook. “Stiamo già lavorando – ha proseguito – per redigere il piano energetico regionale, per il completamento del piano paesaggistico regionale e per definire, entro sei mesi, la mappa delle aree idonee ad ospitare gli impianti”. “Voglio essere chiara – ha continuato Todde – ancora una volta. La transizione ecologica è il nostro presente e il nostro futuro e le fonti rinnovabili sono centrali per lo sviluppo sostenibile della Sardegna. Per questo è necessario che lo sviluppo e la realizzazione di nuovi impianti di produzione di energia elettrica da fonti rinnovabili avvenga in un contesto di tutela e salvaguardia dell’ambiente e del paesaggio. Non possiamo più accettare che si speculi e si lucri su territorio, suolo e paesaggio. Non possiamo più permettere che il nostro territorio venga calpestato. Voglio ringraziare – ha aggiunto – la squadra che ha lavorato giorno e notte per superare anni di inerzia che ci hanno obbligato a dover correre per raggiungere questo risultato. Grazie agli assessori all’Ambiente, all’Industria, alla Cultura, all’Agricoltura, all’Urbanistica. Ringrazio il Consiglio regionale che ha dato priorità a questa legge e tutta la maggioranza – ha concluso – che lo ha sostenuto e le forze di minoranza”. – Foto: Agenzia Fotogramma – (ITALPRESS).

author: Bill Salasya
title: Tez Johnson and Dillon Gabriel Put on a Show at Oregon Ducks' Pro Day
text:
The NFL draft is here – April 25-26 – and the Oregon Ducks Pro Day held on Tuesday, March 18, at the Moshofsky Center was a golden stage for Oregon stars to showcase their skills. For prospects like wide receiver Tez Johnson and quarterback Dillon Gabriel, it was one of the last chances to boost their draft stock, and they certainly made the most of it.
San Francisco 49ers general manager John Lynch, Justin Herbert of the Los Angeles Chargers, and Bo Nix of the Denver Broncos were in attendance to show support.
With College Sports Network’s NFL Mock Draft Simulator, you call the shots. Draft your favorite college stars and shape the destiny of one or all 32 teams. Tez Johnson and Dillon Gabriel Shine at Ducks’ Pro Day You had better be fast to break into the NFL as a wide receiver at 5’10” and 154 pounds. In the NFL Combine, all eyes were on Johnson to deliver a blazing 40-yard dash time and silence critics questioning whether his smaller frame could thrive at the next level. However, his 4.51-second sprint was far below expectations, ranking him 27th among wide receivers.
Many expected Johnson to use Oregon’s Pro Day to improve his 40-yard dash time. Instead, the WR focused on passing drills . Teaming up with Gabriel, the 2025 NFL Draft top 100 prospects gave a show. Gabriel delivered a series of pinpoint throws, and Johnson matched his energy with impressive catches.
Gabriel, the most experienced collegiate quarterback in history, is also preparing for his next step: the NFL. The 5’11”, 205-pound quarterback threw for 3,857 yards and 30 touchdowns in the 2024 season. He led the Ducks to a 13-1 record that saw them win the Big Ten Championship and earn the No. 1 seed in the College Football Playoff.
The sixth-year hopes his experience and performance at the Senior Bowl , NFL Combine, and Oregon’s Pro Day will be enough to solidify his place in the upcoming draft.
KEEP READING: Oregon Legends Justin Herbert and Bo Nix Show up for Dillon Gabriel’s Big Moment
In this year’s NFL draft, Oregon has its sights on another record for the number of players drafted into the pros. In 2024, they had eight players drafted – a program best. Building on that, 12 Ducks received coveted invitations to last month’s NFL Combine.
College Sports Network has you covered with the latest news, analysis, insights, and trending stories in football , basketball , and more!

author: Guoke
title: 柳北区 农文旅插上智慧翅膀
text:
本报讯 （广西云-广西日报记者谢永辉）近日，柳州市柳北区农文旅智慧终端数字管理中心项目合作意向协议签约仪式在白露街道举行。
据了解，该项目主要涵盖农文旅和乡村治理领域，通过智慧化手段实现柳北区资源的高效整合与管理，提升用户体验，赋能农文旅产业高质量发展，推进农业农村数字化转型。项目定位为广西农文旅智慧终端数字管理中心的样板展示，扎根柳北，辐射广西、全国及东盟地区。
该项目包含智能硬件研发、软件设计、物联网应用等多元化领域，配备先进的智慧终端管理中心、科研实验室、大数据中心、终端机器人、无人机制造及维保基地，为智慧终端机器人和无人机应用提供强大的技术支持与数据保障，并加速产品迭代与技术升级。
项目建成后，将通过租赁场地及乡村振兴资产租赁的方式增加村集体收入，预计每年为白露街道小村村、园艺村集体经济增收约64万元。同时，项目还将优先吸纳柳北区辖区范围内农村劳动力就业。

author: @indiatoday
title: Why Qatar court reversing death penalty of 8 navy veterans is a big victory for Indian diplomacy - India Today
text: Why Qatar court reversing death penalty of 8 navy veterans is a big victory for Indian diplomacy The Modi government had mounted a full-fledged legal challenge and intervention to save the former Indian Navy personnel. The case was a crucial test of the government’s diplomatic heft in a general election year Listen to Story The Qatar Court of Appeal setting aside the death sentences of eight former Indian Navy personnel, accused of spying for Israel, is a major victory for the Narendra Modi government’s diplomacy. The court’s decision, on December 28, came almost a month after Prime Minister Modi had met Qatar’s Emir Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani on the sidelines of the COP28 summit in Dubai on December 1. Both leaders had discussed the bilateral partnership and the “well-being of the Indian community” in Qatar. While Indian authorities did not divulge much about the meeting, the interaction may have prompted a change of position among the Qatari authorities on the death sentence case. On December 3, just two days after Modi and Al Thani met, Indian ambassador to Qatar Vipul got the first consular access to meet the eight Indians in prison. The “sentences have been reduced” in the Court of Appeal of Qatar in the Dahra Global case (case of Indians in Qatari custody), informed the ministry of external affairs (MEA) in a statement on December 28, adding that details of the judgment were awaited. “We are in close touch with the legal team as well as the family members to decide on the next steps. We have stood by them since the beginning, and we will continue to extend all consular and legal assistance. We will also continue to take up the matter with the Qatari authorities,” the statement said. The death sentences were pronounced by a Qatari court on October 26. The Indian government had mounted a full-fledged legal challenge besides engaging in proactive diplomacy to secure the release of the eight naval veterans, identified as Captain Navtej Singh Gill, Captain Birendra Kumar Verma, Captain Saurabh Vasisht, Commander Amit Nagpal, Commander Purnendu Tiwari, Commander Sugunakar Pakala, Commander Sanjeev Gupta and Sailor Rajesh. The outcome of the intervention was bound to be seen by many as a measure of the government’s diplomatic heft in a general election year. Official sources claim that since the Court of Appeal has commuted the death sentences, the former Indian Navy personnel may have to serve only prison terms, which could be several years long. It is also possible that they may get to serve their jail time back home under an agreement between India and Qatar, the sources claimed. In 2015, during Al Thani’s India visit, the two countries had signed multiple agreements, including one on prisoner repatriation. The pact allows Indian and Qatari citizens convicted of crimes to be extradited to their home country to serve the remainder of their prison sentences. Official sources said a third possibility was pardon by Qatar’s emir on humanitarian grounds. The naval veterans were employees of the Qatar-based Al Dahra Global Technologies and Consultancy Services. The company, established in 2014, is owned by Khamis Al Ajami, a retired squadron leader of the Royal Air Force of Oman who has world-class training infrastructure for the Qatari Emiri Naval Forces and was conducting radar navigation training for their cadets. Ajami was also arrested in the case but secured bail in November 2022, while the eight Indians had been detained at separate locations in Doha since August last year. Soon after the arrests, the company closed operations in Doha. According to Indian defence officials, all eight former naval officials had an ‘impeccable’ record while serving the Indian Navy and had taken voluntary retirement while holding important positions for up to two decades of their service. Commander Tiwari was awarded the Pravasi Bharatiya Samman Award in 2019, the highest honour conferred on overseas Indians. Qatar and India have enjoyed good relations. India was among the few countries to recognise Qatar soon after its independence in 1971. The two nations established full diplomatic relations in 1973—thus 2023, incidentally, marks 50 years of the bilateral relationship. Qatar is a big contributor to India’s energy security, accounting for almost half of New Delhi’s liquefied natural gas imports. Qatar has so far not made any public statements about the trial conducted by the country’s Court of First Instance. The charges against the eight Indians were never made public, not even shared with their family members. Some reports have claimed that secrets pertaining to Qatar’s stealth submarine programme had been leaked to Israel and that the Indians were facing ‘espionage’ charges. [Subscribe to India Today Magazine](https://subscriptions.intoday.in/indiatoday?utm_source=Insights)

author: 小浪财讯
title: 红利低波100ETF（515100）跌0.74%，半日成交额4505.24万元|100ETF_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，红利低波100ETF（515100）跌0.74%，报1.470元，成交额4505.24万元。红利低波100ETF（515100）重仓股方面， 冀中能源 截止午盘跌1.74%， 大秦铁路 涨0.00%， 厦门国贸 跌0.65%， 北元集团 跌0.73%， 养元饮品 跌0.46%， 雅戈尔 跌0.28%， 嘉化能源 跌0.48%， 双汇发展 跌0.16%， 中国石化 跌0.35%， 陕西煤业 跌1.05%。
红利低波100ETF（515100）业绩比较基准为中证红利低波动100指数收益率，管理人为景顺长城基金管理有限公司，基金经理为龚丽丽，成立（2020-05-22）以来回报为98.99%，近一个月回报为0.56%。

author: Ana Márquez
title: Plumíferos rebajados para elevar tus looks bajo cero a pie de calle
text:
Con la alerta activada por la ola de frío y con las rebajas en pleno apogeo, qué mejor ocasión para invertir en un buen plumífero y elevar tus looks a pie de calle. Lo que distinguen a estos abrigos de otros es su relleno de plumón, que proporciona una increíble relación entre ligereza y calidez. Esta característica permite mantener el cuerpo abrigado sin añadir un volumen excesivo. Además, existen una gran variedad de estilos para adaptarlos a diferentes ocasiones, desde elegantes hasta urbanitas o casuales. Rastreamos las mejores marcas en busca de los plumíferos más cómodos, especiales y calentitos… ¡Aún queda mucho invierno (y frío) por delante!
Plumíferos urbanitas
El aislamiento térmico del plumón de estos abrigos permite usarlo en condiciones extremas de frío sin sacrificar el confort. Es la prenda perfecta para cuando vas de viaje pues destaca por la capacidad de comprimirse fácilmente.
Olivia Palermo borda sus looks street style, incluso en pleno invierno, pues no duda en apostar por plumíferos. Su marca de cabecera es Moorer, pero no tienen rebajas. Sin embargo, hemos encontrado uno muy similar al que luce la influencer neoyorkina en Henry Arroway. Precio: Precio: 625 € (antes 500 €).
El plumífero largo, con un diseño que abraza la figura, es una elección versátil y la más ideal para ocasiones formales, ya que añaden un toque de estilo y elegancia.
La parka larga de Simorra está realizada en pluma de plumón y es entallada mediante un cinturón de goma. Precio: 368 € (antes 468 €).
La opción de largo tres cuartos también es perfecta para el street style, sobre todo si es en colores oscuros y detalles refinados, como este plumífero de Colmar, con tejido jacquard. Precio: 654 € (antes 1.090 €).
Plumíferos casuales con estilo
Pese a que tengamos relacionados este tipo de abrigos con actividades de fin de semana y deportivas en la nieve, a la vista está que también con un plumífero se puede conseguir un look chic. La clave está en los complementos y cómo combinarlo.
Los plumíferos cortos también son una gran apuesta, sobre todo si apuestas por el contraste. Es decir, si el plumífero es oscuro combínalo con prendas claras, y al revés.
El plumífero de Liu Jo lleva una capucha grande con cremallera que se abre formando una gran solapa. Precio: 237,60 € (antes 396 €).
Chaqueta Essential ajustada con capucha de Tommy Hilfiger con capucha extraíble. Es de poliéster reciclado y relleno de plumón. Precio: 114 € (antes 229,90 €).
El clásico y atemporal plumífero en color negro
Clásico y atemporal, que combina estilo y funcionalidad. Si quieres invertir en un plumífero que no pase nunca de moda, elige uno que sea en color negro. Su simplicidad se puede traducir en sofisticación, siendo una elección acertada para eventos formales o salidas nocturna en pleno mes de enero.
La marca Save the Duck tiene un fuerte compromiso con el bienestar animal demostrando que es posible crear abrigos puffer bien calentitos sin necesidad de usar plumas naturales.
El modelo de la foto superior de Save the Duck tiene acabado brillante. Precio de 259 € (antes 369 €).
En la línea animal free, encontramos este abrigo de Columbia con aislamiento sintético que retiene el calor como el plumón. Precio: 102 € (antes 170 €).
Dentro de las rebajas de Isabel Marant encontramos este plumífero crop acolchado, el exterior está confeccionado botellas de plástico recicladas. Precio: 279 (antes 495€).

author: Anthony Vincent
title: Cette enseigne de destockage va vendre 170 000 paires de chaussures Minelli à prix cassé
text: Entre les rachats in extremis, redressement et liquidation judiciaire qui chahutent le secteur de la mode milieu de gamme en France, il arrive que certains articles finissent par être vendus à des prix fracassés. C’est le cas de l’enseigne [Minelli, placé en redressement judiciaire en septembre 2023](https://www.madmoizelle.com/la-marque-de-chaussures-minelli-vient-detre-placee-en-redressement-judiciaire-1579051), avant de [trouver trois repreneurs le 8 janvier 2024](https://www.madmoizelle.com/que-va-devenir-minelli-entre-redressement-judiciaire-et-changement-de-nom-1612889) : la marque Mes Demoiselles, ainsi que les investisseurs DS Invest et Union Brothers. Pour réussir cette reprise, 73 magasins ferment définitivement (39 magasins et 8 corners dans des centres commerciaux subsisteront sur les 120 points de vente), et 213 postes sur 600 se suppriment. Au milieu de cette [casse sociale](https://www.madmoizelle.com/ces-2-marques-de-mode-enfant-culte-risquent-de-fermer-pour-toujours-1738477), [certaines boutiques à l’aube de leur fermeture ont dû brader leurs souliers et accessoires de maroquinerie](https://www.madmoizelle.com/cette-enseigne-de-chaussures-quon-adore-fait-un-grand-destockage-a-petit-prix-1738877). Mais puisque tout n’a pas eu le temps d’être écoulé, c’est le déstockeur Noz qui va se charger du reste. Un bon plan mode qui peut faire du bien au budget ? Chaussures, sacs, maroquinerie et produits d’entretien devraient être vendus chez ce destockeur à -60% d’ici cet été. Un bon plan mode à connaître. La grande braderie des chaussures Minelli se poursuit chez Noz En effet, Noz a racheté près de [191 000 articles Minelli, dont 170 000 paires de chaussures, rapporte BFM Business](https://www.bfmtv.com/economie/entreprises/services/170-000-paires-de-chaussures-minelli-vont-etre-vendues-a-prix-casse-chez-noz_AV-202403280606.html). Cette chaîne de magasins française de déstockage généraliste fondée en 1992 a remporté le 20 mars 2024 l’appel d’offre lancé par le mandataire chargé du recouvrement des créances de la marque de souliers. On devrait donc d’ici cet été retrouver dans les 317 boutiques Noz des collections récentes de Minelli, aussi bien des chaussures, de la maroquinerie, des produits d’entretien, et autres accessoires, à -60% de leur prix boutique initiale. Les affaires sont les affaires. À lire aussi : [ « Les vendeuses dans l’habillement sont déshumanisées » : interview d’une syndicaliste sur l’effondrement de la mode milieu de gamme ](https://www.madmoizelle.com/les-vendeuses-dans-lhabillement-sont-deshumanisees-interview-dune-syndicaliste-sur-leffondrement-de-la-mode-milieu-de-gamme-1622027) Vous aimez nos articles ? Vous adorerez nos podcasts. [Toutes nos séries, à écouter d’urgence ici.](https://podcasts.madmoizelle.com/)
